content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[customers]
(
	[customer_sk] [int],
	[customer_id] [nvarchar](50),
	[customer_unique_id] [nvarchar](50),
	[customer_zip_code_prefix] [int],
	[customer_city] [nvarchar](50),
	[customer_state] [nvarchar](50),
	[birth_date] [datetime2](7),
	[gender] [nvarchar](50),
	[name] [nvarchar](50),
	[marital_status] [nvarchar](50),
	[income] [nvarchar](50),
	[employement_status] [nvarchar](50),
	[job_role] [nvarchar](50),
	[phone_no] [nvarchar](50),
	[scd_is_current] [nvarchar](50)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/data/intermediate/customers.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [customers_staged],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CSV]
)
